visual.name: RadialBarChartD
visual.description: Radial Bar Chart with option of drilldown by categories

dataRoles.description: Refers to the primary categories that are displayed at the first level of the hierarchy
dataRoles.name: yaxis

dataRoles.description: Denotes the subcategories that are presented at the second level within each primary category
dataRoles.name: xaxis

dataRoles.description: Represents the specific metric you want to visualize. The grouping or categorization depends on the level you are currently viewing
dataRoles.name: firstmeasure

dataRoles.description: This measure is displayed at the second level of the hierarchy. If no second measure is set, the First measure is used at both levels.
dataRoles.name: secondmeasure

dataRoles.description: Sets a benchmark metric to compare with the performance of the First Measure
dataRoles.name: target

dataRoles.description: An additional metric that you can include in the tooltip when hovering over the visual for enhanced information
dataRoles.name: extraTooltip

generalView.description: Turn on/off the values that you want to include as part of the grand total

enumeration.description: Create a type of sonar view

allowGoBack_blank_space.displayName: Go Back when Clicking Outside Blank Space

showValue.displayName: What value should appear on drill down?
